name: Legalized
description:
Legalized, a game where you can... shoot things (?)

This game is still in development, there are other things such as weapons or scenarios wich will come in the future.

If you've find any bug/glitch please tell me in the comments, i will try to solve it as soon as possible.

Press "2" (Two) to pick up a knife, if you did pick the shotgun pickup, press "3" (Three) to equip it, press "1" (One) to change it back to the glock.

press "Tab" to restart the game if you glitched somehow.
